name: Al Haiyy
description: Al Haiyy translates to "The Ever-Living" in Arabic. It is one of the names of Allah in Islam, reflecting His eternal existence and the fact that He is alive without beginning or end.
summary: The name Al Haiyy signifies the attribute of life that is all-encompassing and perfect. It conveys that Allah's life is not like that of His creation; He is self-sustained and independent, contrasting with the finite nature of all living beings. This name emphasizes the importance of Allah's eternal presence and His continuous maintenance of the universe.
